metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6516 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Race condition in the ioctl_file_dedupe_range function in fs/ioctl.c in theLinux kernel through 4.7 allows local users to cause a denial of service(heap-based buffer overflow) or possibly gain privileges by changing acertain count value, aka a "double fetch" vulnerability.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
